Name: Name
No state change on 85°C reading (initial: No state change on 85°C reading (initial state of DS18B20 in case of power failure)
Start or enable adapter first: Start or enable adapter OWFS first
tooltip_interval: How often the inputs will be read (in seconds)
tooltip_local: Activate it if 1-wire runs on the same system. It is faster and do not require TCP server.
tooltip_path: Path to the OWFS directory like '/mnt/1wire'
